mapper.sql: INNER JOIN interrogation_record ON interrogation_record.id = case3.interrogation_record_id INNER JOIN patient ON patient.id = interrogation_record.patient_id INNER JOIN doctor ON doctor.id = interrogation_record.doctor_id

SELECT COUNT(case3.id) FROM case3
AND doctor.id=#{parameters.doctorId}
